t: Amazon.com: Classy Spirits Filtration System. Reduce Harsh Harmful Chemicals In Alcohol. Take Away the Burn, Bite & Improve Smoothness in Vodka, Tequila, Whiskey, Bourbon, Brandy, & Cognac.: Home & Kitchen

Classy Spirits Alcohol Filtration System. Reduce Hangovers, Burn, Bite & Improve smoothness by Decreasing Acetone & Acetaldehyde in Bottled Alcohol Vodka, Tequila, Whiskey, Bourbon, Brandy, & Cognac. : Amazon.ca: Home
s: Classy Spirits Filtration System will oxygenate your liquor, act as a decanter, and reduce the unwanted harmful chemicals while retaining the taste and increasing the quality and smoothness in bottled bourbon, Scotch, whiskey, cognac, brandy, vodka, and tequila.
